column4: Hello all, I just recently updated Ubuntu to the latest version and now I'm having a lot of problems with it. I have a dual booted machine, grub loads fine, when I select ubuntu it freezes at the loading screen. But in recovery mode I can browse all my files I just can't start X.
sounds like your grub has been missconfigured; I apologize but I know very little about it however would start there :s
did you check your grub settings for hd 0,0 etc?
I don't know how to do that
